full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO RNAM DAG NGOS BZUNG MTHUS, ,BSTAN PA LTAR BCOS CHOS LOG SNA TSOGS DANG, BSTAN PA GRUB RTAGS STON ZOL GYIS GNOD RNAMS, ,BSTAN PA'I DGRA RU GSAL BYED ME LONG BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,CES CHOS DANG CHOS MIN GYI KHYAD PAR GSAL BYED KYI ME LONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DENG DUS KYI 'GA' ZHIG GIS RTOGS PA SHIN TU MTHON PO'I SPYOD PA RNAMS DANG DU BLANGS TE SBYAR BAR 'DOD KYANG, SPYOD TSUL NI RGYAL BA DANG RGYAL SRAS KYIS SNYIGS DUS SU MA RABS PA RNAMS SPYOD PA SNA TSOGS BSTAN PA LUNG BSTAN PA DANG MTHUN PAR SNANG BA'I RKYEN GYIS, ,BDAG BKA' BCU 'JIGS MED 'OD ZER GYIS MKHAS PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI LUNG DRANGS TE 'DI LTAR DU BRIS PA'O,, ,,)
